credits.name: CXDezign
credits.contribution: Created the original Legacy MDC Panel, which served as the foundational inspiration for this project. Designed the iconic logos and the initial user interface that many in the community came to know and love.

credits.name: monster
credits.contribution: Created the original LSPD Arrest Report on the website https://report.monstyy.top/, which was used as a heavy inspiration for the advanced report on this website.

credits.name: paz?
credits.contribution: Created the original Parole Tracking Program & Rules Violation reports on their website https://pazgtaw.github.io/paperwork-generator/ which was used as inspiration to create the paperwork generators on this website.

credits.name: Bidrift
credits.contribution: Worked on a few relevant features such as the Log Parser in the MDC Panel, actively contributing and helping develop new features through Pull Requests.
